description.zh-cn: 汉朝公主，汉高祖刘邦与皇后吕雉的长女。
description.en: A princess of the Han Dynasty, the eldest daughter of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang, and Empress Lü Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝，鲁元公主的父亲。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han Dynasty and the father of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后，鲁元公主的母亲。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang, and the mother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第二位皇帝，鲁元公主的弟弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Han Dynasty and the younger brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝初年赵王，张耳之子，鲁元公主的丈夫。
description.en: King of Zhao in the early Han Dynasty, son of Zhang Er, and husband of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主与张敖之子。
description.en: Son of Princess Yuan of Lu and Zhang Ao.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主与张敖之女，汉惠帝的皇后。
description.en: Daughter of Princess Yuan of Lu and Zhang Ao, and empress of Emperor Hui of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝初年赵王，张敖的父亲。
description.en: King of Zhao in the early Han Dynasty and father of Zhang Ao.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝灭亡后，刘邦与项羽为争夺统治权而展开的战争。
description.en: A war for supremacy over China fought between Liu Bang and Xiang Yu after the fall of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣之一。
description.en: One of the founding heroes of the Western Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉官员，曾建议与匈奴和亲。
description.en: An official of the Western Han Dynasty who suggested the Heqin marriage alliance with the Xiongnu.

description.zh-cn: 匈奴帝国的建立者和第一位单于。
description.en: The founder and first Chanyu of the Xiongnu Empire.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代统治者与周边民族或国家之间的一种政治联姻政策。
description.en: A historical policy of political marriage alliance between Chinese rulers and rulers of neighboring peoples or states.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦的长子，鲁元公主的异母兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Liu Bang and the half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继秦朝之后的大一统王朝。
description.en: The second imperial dynasty of China, which succeeded the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的父亲。
description.en: Father of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 吕雉的父亲，鲁元公主的外祖父。
description.en: Father of Lü Zhi and maternal grandfather of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第三子，鲁元公主的异母弟。
description.en: The third son of Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第四子，鲁元公主的异母弟，后继位为汉文帝。
description.en: The fourth son of Liu Bang, half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu, who later became Emperor Wen of Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第五子，鲁元公主的异母弟。
description.en: The fifth son of Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第六子，鲁元公主的异母弟。
description.en: The sixth son of Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第七子，鲁元公主的异母弟。
description.en: The seventh son of Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦第八子，鲁元公主的异母弟。
description.en: The eighth son of Liu Bang and half-brother of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘邦的长女。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the eldest daughter of Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是吕雉的长女。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the eldest daughter of Lü Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主嫁给赵王张敖为妻。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu married Zhang Ao, the King of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 张偃是鲁元公主的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Yan is the son of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 孝惠张皇后是鲁元公主的女儿。
description.en: Empress Zhang is the daughter of Princess Yuan of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主之女张氏被其舅舅汉惠帝立为皇后。
description.en: Princess Yuan's daughter, Lady Zhang, was made empress by her maternal uncle, Emperor Hui of Han.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是汉惠帝的姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the elder sister of Emperor Hui of Han.

description.zh-cn: 在楚汉战争中，刘邦为逃命曾将鲁元公主推下车。
description.en: During the Chu–Han Contention, Liu Bang pushed Princess Yuan of Lu out of his chariot to escape.

description.zh-cn: 在刘邦将子女推下车后，夏侯婴将鲁元公主救回车上。
description.en: After Liu Bang pushed his children off the chariot, Xiahou Ying rescued Princess Yuan of Lu and brought her back onto it.

description.zh-cn: 刘敬向刘邦建议将鲁元公主嫁给匈奴冒顿单于以实行和亲政策。
description.en: Liu Jing suggested to Liu Bang that he should marry Princess Yuan of Lu to Modu Chanyu of the Xiongnu to implement the Heqin policy.

description.zh-cn: 吕雉因日夜哭泣反对，阻止了刘邦将鲁元公主嫁给冒顿单于的和亲计划。
description.en: Lü Zhi's constant weeping and opposition prevented Liu Bang's plan to marry Princess Yuan of Lu to Modu Chanyu as part of the Heqin alliance.

description.zh-cn: 为求自保，齐王刘肥将齐国的城阳郡作为公主的汤沐邑献上，并尊其为齐国王太后。
description.en: To protect himself, Liu Fei, King of Qi, presented the Chengyang Commandery of Qi to Princess Yuan of Lu as her fief and honored her as the Queen Dowager of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 张敖是张耳的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Ao is the son of Zhang Er.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦是刘太公的儿子。
description.en: Liu Bang is the son of Liu Taigong.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦是刘媪的儿子。
description.en: Liu Bang is the son of Liu Ao.

description.zh-cn: 吕雉是吕公的女儿。
description.en: Lü Zhi is the daughter of Lü Gong.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘肥的异母妹妹。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Fei.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘如意的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Ruyi.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘恒的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Heng.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘恢的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Hui.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘友的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu You.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘长的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Zhang.

description.zh-cn: 鲁元公主是刘建的异母姐姐。
description.en: Princess Yuan of Lu is the half-sister of Liu Jian.
